item.title: breathing
item.description: my hands on your thighs your hands on my face we’re doing the same thing keeping each other still my mouth on your hardened bud

item.title: bruises
item.description: have you ever wondered, babe why i moan when you bruise my lips why my breath hitches when you dig your nails

item.title: devils drawn
item.description: there’s a valley between your thighs that unbosoms heaven drawing devils in, drawing devils to, drawing devils deep also: some old poetry i wrote when I was young

item.title: echoes
item.description: licking, do you want a taste? forbidden, do you still resist? moans and echoes, echoes, echoes. also: some old poetry i wrote when I was young

item.title: hick-ys
item.description: with a font size of twenty eight printed on the page that is your skin a period, no, an exclamation mark

item.title: in love
item.description: pushing two fingers deep, you swore you’re in love you came down from ecstasy it was a mistake also: some old poetry i wrote when I was young

item.title: oasis
item.description: i found an oasis in the rift between your legs but it made me thirstier so i drowned in the torrent

item.title: tasting
item.description: you smell like arousal and i indulge in the sweetness of your redolence tasting, tasting, tasting. also: some old poetry i wrote when I was young

item.title: yes
item.description: heart shaped hickey on your neck lips swollen, wounded, scarred bodies blended as one yes, yes, yes also: some old poetry i wrote when I was young
